```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
library("knitr")

library("tidyverse")

source("https://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
biocLite("phyloseq")

library("phyloseq")

load("phyloseq_object.RData")

ggplot(metadata, aes(x=PO4_uM, y=Depth_m)) + geom_point(shape="triangle")

ggplot(metadata, aes(x=PO4_uM, y=Depth_m)) + geom_point(size="10")
```
